actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Cooperative Forestry Assistance Act of 1978 to provide assistance, by means of cost sharing, to private forest landowners whose forest lands have been severely damaged as the result of a natural disaster.

summary.text: Amends the Cooperative Forestry Assistance Act of 1978 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to develop a forest land restoration program to provide cost-sharing assistance to private forest landowners to restore to commercial timber production forest lands damaged as a result of a natural disaster. Sets forth conditions to such assistance. Requires the landowner to develop an individual forest land restoration management plan, in cooperation with the State forester or equivalent official, as a basis for a cost-sharing agreement between the landowner and the Secretary.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Cooperative Forestry Assistance Act of 1978 to provide assistance, by means of cost sharing, to private forest landowners whose forest lands have been severely damaged as the result of a natural disaster.
